snippet: Ship accidents are rare, but cruisegoers should also consider other dangers, like fire, onboard crime and the dreaded stomach bug.
abstract: Michelle Higgins Practical Traveler column on the safety of cruise ships, a subject that is much-talked about following the Costa Concordia disaster off the coast of Italy; cruise ship accidents are rare, but cruisegoers should consider other dangers to watch out for while on board.
lead_paragraph: Ship accidents are rare, but cruisegoers should also consider other dangers, like fire, onboard crime and the dreaded stomach bug.

headline.main: So, Just How Safe Is Your Ship?
headline.print_headline: So, Just How Safe Is Your Ship?
